short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a new side-splitting dad joke every time you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dad Joke Extension replaces your Google Chrome tabs with a fun, virtual version of your dad's brain. Powered by icanhazdadjoke.com , this extension is injected with the wit and comedic timing of a master joke-teller, who is feeding you jokes all day long, (or least on every time you open a Chrome tab)
